PIN.values: |highlighting a specific chakra inside a specific sculpture (considering vertical position and color, just a few single LEDs are on)|
|full LED strip in the color of specific chakra (each sculpture different color)|
|all strips together where the light is passed from one sculpture to another|
|for example have a green HEART chakra in one sculpture and then to have it in all the other sculptures etc.|
|6 x APA102 LED strips 60pixel/meter&cr;&lf;serially connected in an array of 360 pixels in total&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;1 x Arduino MEGA 2560&cr;&lf;DATA PIN 51, COCK PIN 53&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;1 x Kinect 2|
|LIGHT CHANGES&cr;&lf;>>>>&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;6 strips x 60 LEDs&cr;&lf;= 360 pixels array&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;APA102|
|OUTPUT to Arduino Mega 2560, try #1&cr;&lf;>>>>&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;DATA PIN 51&cr;&lf;CLOCK PIN 53|
|OUTPUT to Arduino Mega 2560, try #2&cr;&lf;>>>>&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;DATA PIN ANALOG 9&cr;&lf;CLOCK PIN ANALOG 10|
|maybe we can also go for PWM pins, PWM9 & PWM10 for example|
|4 Values that we apply to the pins 9,10,11,12 in Arduino|
|Some Header and End Character to double make sure we get the apropiate packet in Arduino.|
